question: The recently launched Operation Save Kurma by the Wildlife Crime Control Bureau (WCCB) aims to protect _?
explanation: Operation Save Kurma was a species specific operation on turtles launched from December 15, 2016 to January 30, 2017. Under it total of 15,739 live turtles were recovered from 45 suspects, having inter-state linkages. It helped the enforcement agencies to focus on the existing trade routes and major trade hubs in the country, which will be continued in future.
